message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet halfway at $15,000?  It's a fantastic deal for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm trying to be flexible, but $15,000 is really the lowest I'm willing to go. I believe the product is well worth it, and I'm confident you'll agree once you start using it.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product offers, I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product.
